img_summary: The image is a screenshot from a video game showing a battle scene set in a lush, forested environment at night. A character, possibly the player, is engaged in combat with a creature named "Yellow Loong," as indicated by the health bar at the bottom of the screen. The creature is airborne, with glowing eyes and a menacing appearance. The user interface displays various icons and gauges, suggesting available actions or abilities for the player, with health and stamina bars located at the bottom left corner.
